categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: H-Delta Squadron was a TIE/ad starfighter squadron in service of the fleet of renegade Admiral Harkov, who defected to the Alliance to Restore the Republic in 3 ABY. H-Delta Squadron took part in defending Rebel outpost DS 5 from the Galactic Empire, but ultimately their efforts proved to be futile. Admiral Harkov was captured, and all fighters were destroyed.
